item.title: Android Pentest Note
item.author: quactv
item.description: Concept Decompile and compile Using Adb and Frida interact Android Concept Structure AndroidManifest file contains the applicationâ€™s structure Res folder contains all the resources that the application needs to run , including user interface layout, icons, audio, etc. The most interesting files for us are the classes.dex files because they are the compiled java files. The .dex extension stands for Dalvik EXecutable. So we need to decompile these dex files to get the java classes.
